title: Wazzup guys i have a story for you!
body:
Dude this really hot girl said she'd send me nudes if i performed 3 trials for her

First was the trial of listening, I had to listen to her life story completely from the time her mom  gave birth to her days now I had to listen to how she was abused as a child and had to be taken out of the household at age 9 and had a string of abusive boy friends

Next was the trial of intelligence i had to perform many showings of my intelligence to her including solving many logical and mathmatical problems with a lot of challenges involved from science to math to literary knowledge she challenged me

finally the trial of Tree Fiddy
at this point i noticed she was a large seaserpent and i yelled "get the fuck out and go get your own damn money!"
